Name: Suspicious Apple Roly Poly
Desc: A traditional apple dessert. Apples are apples, and dough is dough. To force them into a commonality they do not share is to create an awkward mess that even the most flavorful butter cannot rescue.
Effect: After you activate a Petrified Tree, a Ley Line Outcrop, or open a Treasure Chest, restore 16% HP and an extra 600 HP to all party members. This effect can occur once every 5s. Lasts 900s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).
